hadiths.text: Narrated AbuRafi': One day the Prophet (ﷺ) had intercourse with all his wives. He took a bath after each intercourse. I asked him: Messenger of Allah, why don't you make it a single bath? He replied: This is more purifying, better and cleaning. Abu Dawud said: The tradition narrated by Anas is more sound that this tradition

chapter.ara-name: باب الْوُضُوءِ لِمَنْ أَرَادَ أَنْ يَعُودَ
chapter.eng-name: Performing Wudu' For One Who Wishes To Repeat (The Act)
